SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.cluster

Interface TransportStatistics

public interface TransportStatistics
Encapsulates statistics for a transport. User: akorostov Date: 3/6/13

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getAdditionalStatsForLog()
    Returns additional human readable statistic details for log (comma separated).
    long
    getBytesReceived()
    Total size of all messages received since start.
    long
    getBytesSent()
    Total size of all messages sent since start.
    default long
    getClientMessagesReceived()
    Returns the total number of received client messages.
    Map<String,Object>
    getConfiguration()
    Returns the transport configuration
    long
    getErrors()
    Returns the number of transport errors.
    List<TransportError>
    getLastErrors()
    Returns the last few transport errors.
    long
    getMessagesReceived()
    Returns the total number of received messages.
    default long
    getMessagesReceivedWithLatencyUnderThreshold()
    Returns the number of received messages with latency under threshold value.
    long
    getMessagesSent()
    Returns the number of sent messages.
    Map<String,Object>
    getOtherStats()
    Returns additional protocol specific counters/stats values.
    Collection<StatisticsAttributeInfo>
    getOtherStatsMetadata()
    Returns additional protocol specific counters/stats metadata.
    default void
    tearDown()
    tearDown statistics.

  • Method Details

    • getConfiguration

      Map<String,Object> getConfiguration()
      Returns the transport configuration
      Returns:
      the transport configuration

    • getMessagesSent

      long getMessagesSent()
      Returns the number of sent messages.
      Returns:
      the number of sent messages.

    • getMessagesReceived

      long getMessagesReceived()
      Returns the total number of received messages. Depending on the transport implementation this may include system messages (e.g. heart-beats), copies of the same messages.
      Returns:
      the number of received messages.

    • getClientMessagesReceived

      default long getClientMessagesReceived()
      Returns the total number of received client messages. This excludes heartbeats, copies etc.
      Returns:
      the total number of client received messages. Could be -1 if transport does not support counting client messages separately.

    • getMessagesReceivedWithLatencyUnderThreshold

      default long getMessagesReceivedWithLatencyUnderThreshold()
      Returns the number of received messages with latency under threshold value. default return value is -1 if this statistics is not being captured
      Returns:
      the number of received messages with latency under threshold value.

    • getErrors

      long getErrors()
      Returns the number of transport errors.
      Returns:
      the number of transport errors.

    • getLastErrors

      List<TransportError> getLastErrors()
      Returns the last few transport errors.
      Returns:
      the list of errors, the latest error should be at the end of the list

    • getBytesSent

      long getBytesSent()
      Total size of all messages sent since start. Note that for some protocols this might be an approximate number (usually smaller than actual).
      Returns:
      bytes sent since start

    • getBytesReceived

      long getBytesReceived()
      Total size of all messages received since start. Note that for some protocols this might be an approximate number (usually smaller than actual).
      Returns:
      bytes received since start

    • getOtherStatsMetadata

      Collection<StatisticsAttributeInfo> getOtherStatsMetadata()
      Returns additional protocol specific counters/stats metadata. Returns empty collection instead of null.
      Returns:
      additional protocol specific counters/stats metadata, never null

    • getOtherStats

      Map<String,Object> getOtherStats()
      Returns additional protocol specific counters/stats values. Returns empty map instead of null.
      Returns:
      additional protocol specific counters/stats, never null

    • getAdditionalStatsForLog

      String getAdditionalStatsForLog()
      Returns additional human readable statistic details for log (comma separated).
      Returns:
      optional additional stats for log.

    • tearDown

      default void tearDown()
      tearDown statistics. Mainly used to clear Prometheus Summary Collectors on Transport#stop()
